aboutData.description: I am a Front-end Developer specializing in JavaScript (TypeScript), with a particular focus on React. I have experience in building and maintaining commercial projects, having worked on a variety of applications, including a web application for a European drifting series and a web application for managing equipment in the mining industry, using technologies like TypeScript, React, and MUI. I feel comfortable working in a team, but I am also independent and capable of handling tasks autonomously. I am always eager to expand my skills and knowledge.
